name: EPIC 248847494
scenarioDescription:
The EPIC 248847494 Exoplanetary System


Overview

EPIC 248847494 is a star with 0.9 times the mass of the Sun, and 2.7 times its radius. It is located 1826.47 light years away from the solar system.

EPIC 248847494 is known to have 1 exoplanets in orbit around it.


Exoplanets in the EPIC 248847494 system


EPIC 248847494 b

EPIC 248847494 b was discovered by the K2 observatory using the transit method. Its semi-major axis is 4.50 astronomical units, as compared to Earth's which is 1 astronomical unit. The mass of EPIC 248847494 b is 4134 times the mass of Earth. The radius of EPIC 248847494 b is 12.442 that of Earth. At more than 50 Earth masses, EPIC 248847494 b is a gas giant, a planet whose mass is mostly made up of hydrogen and helium, like Jupiter and Saturn in our solar system.
description: 3D visualisation and gravity simulation of the exoplanet system EPIC 248847494, which contains 1 planets and was discovered by K2.
